Reviews.Title: “terrible”
Reviews.Author: sara a
Reviews.Content: The most terrible things about this hotel was breakfast, the breakfast was awful with bad smell , the room was dark without cleaning service ,the bath was dirty and without hot water in the morning, I had vary very bad memory of this hotel and advice no body go to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “never never never again”
Reviews.Author: nakinak
Reviews.Content: The breakfast was awful I could not eat anything even a cup of tea ! Room was hot and the bath â€¦.it is better not say anything .. :( I was force to go to this hotel as I had to meet some one there otherwise I never stay even one hour !

Reviews.Title: “absolutely dreadful”
Reviews.Author: MaeveDublin
Reviews.Content: Arrived evening time but needed the light on to see the room! Tiny double room only way to move around it if one person stayed on a bed.The bedroom was dirty, dust every where and food debris,used cups etc on floor.Bathroom was relatively clean but we could see into our neibhbours ensuite as there was no covering for outlet! All bedrooms seemed to open onto an inner tiny yard with smelly drains which explained the lack of light.On our overnight trip from Bulgaria were tourists from Ireland, Norway, Netherlands, Russia, UK, and Bulgaria and everyone complained bitterly about this "hotel". We felt it might be Backpacker standard only.DO'NT GO THERE.......

Reviews.Title: “Never ever again!!!”
Reviews.Author: Moroccantourist
Reviews.Content: So terrible..it's not even 1 star, so why stating 3 or 4 stars?!!!rooms were not clean..service and staff terrible..the roof was covered by humidity...the heating was not working correctly and when I asked for extra cover I didn't get it..the phone in the room was not working so if you have a request you should take the elevator which is not that safe and ask directly in the reception..a real nightmare in a very beautiful city! what a pity..what a shame!

Reviews.Title: “a terrible hotel, never again”
Reviews.Author: EgyptHoneymooner
Reviews.Content: this hotel was the worst hotel ever, services are horrible ,staff was stupid and not friendly , rooms not clean, food not enough or variable, no one there can understand any thing, staff talks only turkish, you dont know how you can communicate, i have been to many hotels but this one is the worst ever, i liked Turkey alot, but didnt like the hotel at all

HotelInfo.Name: Kecik
HotelInfo.Address: Fethibey Cad. No.18 | Laleli, Istanbul, Turkey
